CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, May 29, 1948, pg. 10, reads: "PITTSBURGH'S CHAMP - Meet the champ, Howard Hawkins, newly crowned marble king who will represent the entire city of Pittsburgh in national championships in Atlantic City this summer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: 1948 city of Pittsburgh marbles champion Howard Hawkins, crouching over marbles, with children gathered behind him, vertical format
